name: the quiz VN
description:
Go through three types of fun quizzes! You can donate if you want it will help us to have newer software to make the game better! This was a submission For STAI (Basically a game jam by our school but technically not a game jam )

programming, images and idea by Mohammad Yaseen

Questions by Yusuf 

extra modification ideas by B Prajwal

(Note: This game COULD get an update if we get chosen for the game)
